title: Boston Fed Taps Susan Collins as New President
itunes:title: Boston Fed Taps Susan Collins as New President
description:
Bloomberg News Economics Reporter Steve Matthews, Bloomberg Markets Correspondent Kriti Gupta and Bloomberg News Cross Asset Reporter Katie Greifeld discuss the Federal Reserve Bank of Boston announcing that Susan Collins, a University of Michigan economist, will be its new president, marking the first time a Black woman will lead one of the U.S. central bank’s 12 districts. Chipotle CFO Jack Hartung breaks down earnings, expansion and cost pressures. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News P&I Reporter Peter Robison talk about the Businessweek Magazine cover story Betting Apps Want You to Come for Super Bowl and Gamble Forever. Teva Pharmaceutical CEO Kare Schultz shares details on the company's development of new drugs and settling opioid lawsuits. And we Drive to the Close with Eric Jackson, President at EMJ Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
